author: stsp
msg: Implement a --show-passwords option for 'svnauth list', and hide passwords
Currently, encrypted passwords are treated the same way as plaintext passwords.
(list_credentials): Rename 'cleanup_baton' to 'baton' and expect the option
state in baton. Don't show passwords unless --show-passwords was given.
(subcommand_list): Pass opt_state as baton to the list_credentials callback.

author: cnauroth
msg: HADOOP-9685. hadoop-config.cmd: builds a classpath that is too long on windows. Contributed by Raja Aluri.
